title: How can I install/uninstall apps on my watch?
answer:
**To install an app:**

Select **Get APPS** in the Android Wear app to access Google Play<sup id="EN-US_TOPIC_0020255228__sup52574942174657">TM</sup> and download your favorite apps. If the app is compatible with the Android Wear app, the app icon will appear on the first screen when you swipe to the left from the watch's home screen.

**To uninstall an app:**

Simply uninstall it on your phone.
